resources.string: Read through the following and if you still have questions please don\'t hesitate to contact me:
Do you only find properties in Durban city?
No, if you have a specific location in mind please ask me about it.
How many days of your time will I need to find a flat to rent in Durban?
Why should I use a property finder instead of estate agents?
The estate agents tend to act on behalf of the landlord, because in many cases the agent rents the same flat every time it\'s vacant. I act on your behalf and get you the best deal possible.
Why should I pay you to search for properties for me when I can do it myself online?

It\'s true that there are many online property websites, and I\'m happy to make viewings that you\'ve found yourself on the internet. However, I know a lot of the local estate agents very well and can often find properties before they\'ve been advertised.
How far in advance do I need to book you to start searching for properties to rent?

That depends a little on the budget: cheaper flats rent very quickly if they\'re in good condition. I advise to start the searching process 3-6 weeks before you plan to move in. However, I get booked up in advance, so it\'s best to give me as much notice as possible about your moving dates.
After I\'ve reserved a property, how long does it take to move in?
From reservation to signing the contract and getting your keys can take anything from a couple of days to one week. It\'s not usually longer.
